productList.name: Netflix
productList.description: Netflix offers a vast library of TV shows, movies, documentaries, and original content. Plans start at $6.99/month in the U.S., with regional price variations.

productList.name: Shahid
productList.description: Shahid is a leading Arabic streaming platform for Arabic, Turkish, and Bollywood content, including live sports. Subscription details are on their website.

productList.name: Watch It
productList.description: Watch It is an Egyptian streaming service featuring Arabic TV series, movies, and exclusive shows. Pricing details are available on their site.

productList.name: TOD
productList.description: TOD provides access to all beIN SPORTS channels, along with movies and series. Check their site for subscription plans.

productList.name: Joy TV
productList.description: Joy TV offers a range of entertainment options, including TV channels, movies, and series. Pricing is available on their platform.

productList.name: Amazon Prime Video
productList.description: Amazon Prime Video has a vast array of movies, TV shows, and original content. In the U.S., it costs $8.99/month; local pricing may vary.

productList.name: Spotify
productList.description: Spotify is a music streaming service with an extensive library of songs and podcasts. Premium starts at $9.99/month in the U.S., with local price variations.

productList.name: Anghami
productList.description: Anghami is a music streaming platform with a focus on Arabic and international music. Subscription details are on their site.

productList.name: Disney+
productList.description: Disney+ offers Disney, Pixar, Marvel, Star Wars, and National Geographic content. Plans start at $10.99/month in the U.S.; regional prices vary.

productList.name: Crunchyroll
productList.description: Crunchyroll specializes in anime, offering an extensive library. Premium plans start at $7.99/month.

productList.name: StarzPlay
productList.description: StarzPlay features movies, series, and exclusive content. Pricing is available on their platform.

productList.name: OSN+
productList.description: OSN+ offers various movies, series, and exclusive shows. Subscription info can be found on their website.

productList.name: VIU
productList.description: VIU provides Asian dramas, movies, and variety shows. Subscription details are on their site.

productList.name: Canva Pro
productList.description: Canva Pro is a graphic design platform offering advanced features like Magic Resize. It costs $12.99/month.

productList.name: Adobe Creative Cloud
productList.description: Adobe Creative Cloud includes Photoshop, Illustrator, and more. Individual app subscriptions start at $20.99/month; all apps at $54.99/month.

productList.name: Microsoft Office 2021
productList.description: Microsoft Office 2021 provides essential productivity tools like Word and Excel with a one-time purchase of $39.97.

productList.name: YouTube Premium
productList.description: YouTube Premium offers ad-free viewing, background play, and YouTube Music access. Costs $11.99/month.

productList.name: Apple TV+
productList.description: Apple TV+ offers original content from Apple. Costs $9.99/month.

productList.name: Apple Music
productList.description: Apple Music offers a vast music library. Individual plans cost $10.99/month.

productList.name: Apple iCloud+
productList.description: Apple iCloud+ provides cloud storage and additional features, starting at $0.99/month.

productList.name: Google One
productList.description: Google One is Google’s cloud storage service. Plans start at $1.99/month for 100GB.

productList.name: Google Gemini+
productList.description: Google Gemini+ offers 2TB of storage with AI features. Pricing details are on Google’s official site.

productList.name: Envato Elements
productList.description: Envato Elements provides a vast library of digital assets. Costs $16.50/month if billed annually.

productList.name: Duolingo Super
productList.description: Duolingo Super is an ad-free enhanced version for language learning, costing $6.99/month.
